sen.j: 都祁村（つげむら）は、奈良県北東部にかつて存在した村。
sen.e: Tsuge-mura is a village which once existed in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.
Tsuge-mura is a village which once existed in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.
Tsuge-mura is a village which once existed in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 2005年4月1日に添上郡月ヶ瀬村とともに奈良市へ編入され、消滅した。
sen.e: On April 1, 2005, it was placed to Nara City along with Tsukigase-mura, Soekami district.
On April 1, 2005, it was placed to Nara City along with Tsukigase-mura, Soekami district.
On April 1, 2005, it was placed to Nara City along with Tsukigase-mura, Soekami district.

sen.j: 地理
sen.e: Geography
Geography
Geography

sen.j: 奈良県の北東部、笠置山地（大和高原）に位置する高原の村である。
sen.e: It is a village located in Kasagi hilly district (the Yamato highlands) in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.
It is a village located in Kasagi hilly district (the Yamato highlands) in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.
It is a village located in Kasagi hilly district (the Yamato highlands) in the northeast part of Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 気候は盆地部より比較的冷涼・寒冷で夏季は過ごしやすく、冬季は厳寒を極める。
sen.e: The climate there is rather cold in comparison with the basin area, it is comfortable in summer, while it is terribly cold in winter.
The climate there is rather cold in comparison with the basin area, accordingly it is comfortable in summer, while it is terribly cold in winter.
sen.cmt: it is comfortable in summer --> accordingly it is comfortable in summer
sen.e: The climate there is rather cold in comparison with the basin area, accordingly it is comfortable in summer, while it is terribly cold in winter.

sen.j: 村内を名阪国道が横断しており、交通の至便な地である。
sen.e: Meihan National Route crosses the village, and the village has the best access to transportation.
Meihan National Route runs across the village, thus the village is quite conveniently located in terms of public transportation.
Meihan National Route runs across the village, thus the village is quite conveniently located in terms of public transportation.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1955年（昭和30年）1月1日 山辺郡都介野村・同郡針ヶ別所村が合併し、発足。
sen.e: On January 1, 1955, Tsugeno village and Harigabessho village in Yamabe Country synoecized to establish Tsuge-mura village.
On January 1, 1955, Tsugeno village and Harigabessho village in Yamabe County were synoecized to establish Tsuge-mura village.
sen.cmt: in Yamabe Country synoecized --> in Yamabe County were synoecized
sen.e: On January 1, 1955, Tsugeno village and Harigabessho village in Yamabe County were synoecized to establish Tsuge-mura village.

sen.j: 2005年（平成17年）4月1日 奈良市へ編入され、消滅。
sen.e: On April 1, it was placed to Nara City, and disappeared.
On April 1, it was placed to Nara City, and disappeared.
On April 1, it was placed to Nara City, and disappeared.

sen.j: 行政
sen.e: Administration
Administration
Administration

sen.j: 典型的な「保守的農村」であったと言える。
sen.e: It can be said that Tsuge-mura was a typical `conservative village.'
It can be said that Tsuge-mura was a typical `conservative village.'
It can be said that Tsuge-mura was a typical `conservative village.'

sen.j: 例えば村議会などは、単なる大字ごとの代表者・大字住民の代弁者の集会という色合いが濃かった。
sen.e: For instance, the village council seemed to be a meeting of representative people in each oaza (an administrative unit) and spokespeople of residents in oaza.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: For instance, the village council seemed to be a meeting of representative people in each oaza (an administrative unit) and spokespeople of residents in oaza.
For instance, the village council seemed to be a meeting of representative people in each oaza (an administrative unit) and spokespeople of residents in oaza.

sen.j: そのため、無投票当選が非常に多かった。
sen.e: For that reason, the members of the village council were often selected without a contest.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: For that reason, the members of the village council were often selected without an election.
sen.cmt: without a contest --> without an election
sen.e: For that reason, the members of the village council were often selected without an election.

sen.e: Neighboring autonomous body
Neighboring autonomous body
Neighboring autonomous body

sen.j: 奈良市、天理市、桜井市、山辺郡山添村、宇陀郡榛原町 (奈良県)、室生村
sen.e: Nara City, Tenri City, Sakurai City, Yamazoe Village, Yamabe County, Haibara-cho, Uda County (Nara Prefecture), Muromura
Nara City, Tenri City, Sakurai City, Yamazoe Village, Yamabe County, Haibara-cho, Uda County (Nara Prefecture), Muro Village
Nara City, Tenri City, Sakurai City, Yamazoe Village, Yamabe County, Haibara-cho, Uda County (Nara Prefecture), Muro Village

sen.j: 都祁村立の教育施設は、合併に伴い、全て奈良市に移管された。
sen.e: All the educational institutions were transferred to Nara City due to synoecism.
All the educational institutions were transferred to Nara City due to synoecism.
All the educational institutions were transferred to Nara City due to synoecism.
